ValidationRule.description: Except when the record type is UK, a contract request is only allowed to change if the previous stage is Open.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( RecordType.Name = "UK"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status__c ), "Open")), ISCHANGED(Status__c) , (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Contract Requested")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contract Request is only allowed to change if the previous Stage is Open.
